articles.author: David Goldman
articles.title: Harvard faculty appeal to the university’s board to address its growing number of crises - CNN
articles.description: Some key members of Harvard’s faculty and the university’s top governing body held an extraordinary meeting last week to address the unprecedented problems at one of America’s most prestigious institutions of higher learning.

articles.title: Indian travelers held in French airport over human trafficking investigation - The Associated Press
articles.description: Authorities in France say about 300 Indian citizens heading to Central America are sequestered in a French airport for a third day because of an investigation into suspected human trafficking. Prosecutors say two people were detained and others are still bein…
